May 15, 2017, Ryan was a client of Steven’s

I have been through the interview process at a few different companies and the process at Okta was by far the smoothest and more organized. Steve was on top of following-up and coaching through the interview process. He was available before and after hours and it is very obvious and clear how much he cares about candidates and their success throughout the recruiting process and beyond. The recruiting process can sometimes be a pain but Steve took all of the pain away and made it a pleasant experience.

CTO / Co-Founder at Divvy Homes
January 15, 2015, Nicholas was a client of Steven’s

Hiring has always been one of my top priorities, so I've spent plenty of time working with recruiters. While most usually come with mixed (or poor) results, Steven has consistently referred excellent candidates, who come in to the process well versed in our company and stack. I can't recall many (if any) candidates that weren't strong. Steven also managed the relationship between the candidate and us extremely well. He was always really attentive, responsive and seemed to represent the best interests of both the candidates and the company.
